Interface IGameBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsGameBoard, GameBoard
public interface IGameBoard
iGameBoard interface for GameBoard operations checkIfFree, dropToken, checkForWin, checkTie, checkHorizWin, checkDiagWin, whatsAtPos, and isPlayerAtPos. 2-Dimensional grid starting at Index 0.

  • Method Details

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      A checker to see if a column has a free space, accepts 1 int param
      Parameters:
      c - the index of the column on self to check
      Returns:
      true IF [the column is free] AND false IF [column is full]

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      Checks if the last token placed in the specified column resulted in a win.
      Parameters:
      c - the index of the column where the last token was placed
      Returns:
      true IF [last token in c results in a win] ELSE false

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      Checks to see if the game has resulted in a tie
      Returns:
      true IF [all cells in board are filled] ELSE false

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks to see if the last token placed resulted in a horizontal win
      Parameters:
      pos - the position where the last token was placed
      p - player who placed the last token
      Returns:
      true IF [last token results in a horizontal win] ELSE false

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks to see if the last token placed resulted in a vertical win
      Parameters:
      pos - the position where the last token was placed
      p - the player who placed the last token
      Returns:
      true IF [last token results in a vertical win] ELSE false

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Checks to see if the last token placed resulted in a diagonal win
      Parameters:
      pos - the position where the last token was placed
      p - the player who placed the last token
      Returns:
      true IF [the player has achieved a diagonal win (5 in a row)] ELSE false

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Returns boolean on whether a specified player is at a specified position on the board
      Parameters:
      pos - a position on the game board
      player - the name of the player we are evaluating
      Returns:
      boolean on whether a specified player is at a specified position on the board
